title: Bug 4329: No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, the system should display the results of the search for declarations. The search should first try to get the Java element, and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view in the application. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Use the search option in the dialog box to search for declarations. 
4. Observe that no results are displayed.
